message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's tailored to meet your specific needs and I believe it will greatly benefit your business. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $14,000 for this exceptional product.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value you're presenting, $14,000 is still a bit higher than my budget allows.  I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. In light of your offer, I would like to propose a price of $13,500 for the product. This price reflects the value it brings to your business while remaining within your budget. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both parties.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price.  $13,500 is still a bit more than I can afford right now.  I'm happy to meet you at $13,250.  This would make the deal work for me, and hopefully, it's a number that works for you as well.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering your latest offer, I am willing to sell the product for $13,375. This price reflects the value of the product while also accommodating your budget. I hope this proposal meets your expectations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
